mapper.insert: insert into product_review values ( product_review_seq.nextval, #{review_id}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, #{review_image}, sysdate, #{review_star_rating}, #{product_idx} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM product_review WHERE review_idx=#{ param1 }
mapper.select: SELECT review.review_id, prod.product_name, prod.product_idx, review.review_date, review.review_content, review.review_title FROM product_review review JOIN PRODUCT prod ON review.product_idx = prod.product_idx
